description: '''Goregrind''' is a fusion genre of [[grindcore]] and [[death metal]]. British band [[Carcass (band)|Carcass]] are commonly credited for the emergence of the genre. Goregrind is recognizable by its heavily edited, [[pitch-shift]]ed vocals, abrasive musicianship rooted in grindcore, and lyrical emphasis on gore, death, [[pathology]], and rape.
